title: Magic Item Schema
description: A schema definition for a Magic Item data object.
_comment_description: Detailed description of the schema's purpose
_comment_type: Specifies that the schema is for an object
_comment_properties: Defines the properties of the object

name.description: The name of the magic item

type._comment_enum: Specifies a list of valid values for the property

description.description: A description of the item's appearance and effects

charges.description: The number of charges the item has, if applicable

weight.description: The weight of the item in pounds
weight._comment_minimum: Ensures the weight is not negative

value.description: The value of the item in gold pieces

effects._comment_array: Specifies that this property is an array

items._comment_items: Defines the schema for each item in the array

effects._comment_minItems: Ensures the array has at least one item

creator.description: The creator of the magic item
creator._comment_pattern: Regular expression pattern for the property. Enforces first Last name format.)

created_date.description: The date the item was created
created_date._comment_format: Specifies the format of the property

_comment_required: Specifies the required properties for the object
_comment_additionalProperties: Ensures that only properties defined in the schema are allowed
